Translations.Text: Nos supported Moses 9 profound miracles - ask Infans Israel! When he iit them Pharaoh dictus to eum ego think vos Moses bewitched
He dictus Vos know foderator bene ut non 1 manifest these obviously Dominus de caelum terra. Ego think vos Pharaoh doomed
When he pursued them prout he chased them terra nos drowned eum unus those sided eum totus de them
Nos dictus to Infans Israel afterwards Iit vivens hoc terra! When ultimus prophecy advenit pass nos summon vos totus 1 group
Truthfully nos sent it down truth it advenit Nos non send vos bearer bonus news alias prout warner
Quran nos released slowly in order vos read it people long period nos sent it down totus apud dodum
Proclaim Believe in it non believe in it Those possess knowledge proximus scriptures when it recited them they fall down their chins prostrating
They dictus Glory est noster Dominus. Hoc fulfills noster Dominus prophecy
They fall their chins prostrating weeping Pro it augments their reverence
Dictus Alias Eum DEUS alias Eum the Multus Gracious; whichever cognomen vos use Eum belongs bonus cognomen. Vos non utter tuus Contact Prayers (Salat) too loudly nor secretly; use moderate tone
proclaim Praise est to DEUS qui nunquam genitus est filius nor perfecit He habet partner His kingship nor perfecit He need any ally marasmus magnify Eum constantly
